name: Food Trip (mr_sonelf)
description:
Going outside became difficult after the pandemic, which made eating outside challenging. Street foods were one of the cravings I missed during the pandemic, and now that the pandemic has passed, join me on an adventure and go on a food trip with me!

Controls:

WASD                          →      Move

Spacebar                    →      Jump

LMB                            →      Kick

RMB                           →      Aim

RMB + LMB                 →      Throw Pandog (pandesal + hotdog) 

[trivia: pandesal is a spanish term for salt bread]

Let's Eat!
